text: Weinheim () is a town with about 43,000 people living there in northwest Baden-WÃ¼rttemberg, Germany. It is in the Rhine-Neckar Metropolitan Region, about north of Heidelberg and northeast of Mannheim. Weinheim is known as the "Zwei-Burgen-Stadt", the "town of two castles", because of the two fortresses at the edge of the Odenwald in the east. ==References==
title: Weinheim
